p: Five pathogenic microorganisms were used: two gram-positive bacteria including Streptococcus pneumoniae ( S. pneumonia) and Staphylococcus aureus ( S. aureus), and three gram-negative bacteria including Escherichia coli ( E. coli), Klebsiella pneumoniae ( K. pneumoniae), and Proteus bacilli (P. bacilli). The strains were obtained from Nizwa Hospital at the end of December 2018. The collected bacterial strains were cultured in the biology laboratory at the College of Arts and Science of the University of Nizwa, Nizwa.
